attributes.action: Make the Metropolitan Line Extension to Watford Junction go ahead
attributes.additional_details: London Mayor Sadiq Khan has announced that the Metropolitan Line Extension (formerly Croxley Rail Link) to Watford Junction will now not go ahead. This is despite guarantees that the funding shortfalls would be made up by the government.
attributes.background: We are calling for the government to intervene to make sure this vital transport project goes ahead

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The extension of the Metropolitan Line is the responsibility of Transport for London, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has a petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here: 

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
